long_description: cowley cpa has been acquired by lotito & lazzara, plc. providing large firm experience at small firm prices since 2016. headquartered in farmington hills, mi, with clients both across the state and across the country, cowley cpas, plc provides custom solutions for clients of all sizes. our firm provides services in all areas of tax, accounting and litigation support. whether you're a large corporation, a small business owner, or an individual in need of tax advice, we can provide custom solutions at highly competitive prices. we bring extensive experience and professionalism to every engagement and customize our support to your individual needs and concerns. cowley cpas has been pleased to add two employees in 2020 to meet the ever-growing needs of clients. cowley cpas, plc is on the pulse of modern technology and utilizes it to the fullest to provide efficient and cost-effective solutions for clients. solutions for businesses and individuals, nonprofits, and trusts and estates business valuation.
generated_description: cowley cpas, legally known as cowley cpas plc., is a professional accounting firm headquartered in farmington hills, michigan. established in 2016, the firm provides a range of services including tax, accounting, and litigation support. cowley cpas, plc caters to clients of all sizes, offering custom solutions at competitive prices. the firm leverages modern technology to deliver efficient and cost-effective services. in 2023, cowley cpas, plc was acquired by lotito & lazarra, plc.
